com.buschmais.jqassistant.scm.neo4jserver.impl

Class AbstractServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.server.AbstractNeoServer
      • org.neo4j.server.CommunityNeoServer
        • org.neo4j.server.WrappingNeoServer
          • com.buschmais.jqassistant.scm.neo4jserver.impl.AbstractServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Server, org.neo4j.server.NeoServer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultServerImpl

    public abstract class AbstractServer
extends org.neo4j.server.WrappingNeoServer
implements Server
    Abstract base class for the customized Neo4j server.

    The class adds the JQAServerModule
